channel.title: How Do i make a monster on my server stronger?
channel.description:
How Do i make a monster on my server stronger? Delta source Enemy i want strong is the draugen
Note: i made draugen hit like dessores or whatever
thanks

item.title: How Do i make a monster on my server stronger?
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

NPChandler.java

Search for

hitDiff =

Hint:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1 { hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(2); }

kthxbai

Read full topic
